import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing survey's configuration, including name, introduction, questions, and settings. Creates the survey if it doesn't exist.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to find the survey. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get current survey: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey)
2. Modify fields as needed (Name, Intro, Questions, etc.)
3. Update survey: POST /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\} with modified payload
4. If changing activation: Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/activate](/docs/api/surveys/activate-survey) or [deactivate](/docs/api/surveys/deactivate-survey)

**Notes**: Questions are replaced entirely - include all questions in the update, not just changes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey to update."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"A satisfaction survey that can be assigned to users after ticket resolution.","properties":{"SurveyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the survey."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product this survey belongs to."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this survey is associated with."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the survey."},"Intro":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Introductory text shown to users before the survey questions."},"IsActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the survey is currently active and can be assigned."},"ExpirationInDays":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of days after assignment before the survey expires."},"RemindOnDays":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Days after assignment when reminder notifications are sent (e.g., [1, 3, 7])."},"Questions":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"A question within a survey, including its type and response when used in survey responses.","properties":{"SurveyQuestionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the question."},"SurveyQuestionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Type of question (e.g., text, rating, multiple choice)."},"Question":{"type":"string","description":"The question text displayed to the user."},"Response":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The user's response to this question (populated in survey responses)."},"IsRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this question must be answered to submit the survey."}},"title":"SurveyQuestion"},"description":"List of questions included in this survey."}},"title":"Survey"},"example":{"SurveyId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","Name":"Updated Satisfaction Survey","Intro":"We value your feedback! Please rate your experience.","IsActive":true,"ExpirationInDays":14,"RemindOnDays":[1,5,10],"Questions":[{"SurveyQuestionId":"d1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","SurveyQuestionTypeId":"e1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","Question":"How satisfied were you overall?","IsRequired":true}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
